title: Harman Singh
text:
Hi! I am a recent graduate of John Cabot University with a BA in International Affairs! I have a passion for governance, democracy, and international cooperation. With a strong foundation in comparative politics, international humanitarian law, and data analysis and visualization, I am excited to tackle the problems at the intersection of these sectors. On this website you will find a showcase of my recent projects, demonstrating my ability to analyze and visualize historical trends aimed at academic and policy applications. Click on the following sections to see more.
You can also view my CV.
